thread.title: London apartment complex building floating 'sky pool'
thread.title_full: London apartment complex building floating 'sky pool'

title: London apartment complex building floating 'sky pool'
text:
Would you jump into a pool suspended ten storeys off the ground? 
Those with rooms at London's Embassy Gardens apartment complex will have exactly that chance. 
The complex is constructing the world's first pool that links two residential buildings via the glass chamber swim tank, according to The Telegraph. 
The pool, which measures 90 by 19 feet and stands about four feet deep, will be accessible by both building rooftops, and will include a sun lounging area and bar for those using it. 
The pool should be completed by 2018, but only residents of the two complexes will be able to use it. Poll Would you take a swim in a sky pool? In a heartbeat.
